articles.title: African and South Asian citizens fleeing Ukraine denounce racism - The Washington Post
articles.description: Several African, South Asian and Middle Eastern citizens in Ukraine have denounced instances of racism while trying to flee the shelling in the country.

articles.title: Grab shares plunge 37% after S$1.49 billion quarterly loss - TODAY
articles.description: SINGAPORE — Shares in Grab tumbled 37 per cent on Thursday (March 3) after Southeast Asia's no. 1 ride-hailing and food delivery firm posted a US$1.1 billion (S$1.49 billion) quarterly loss and a worse-than-expected drop in revenue, hit by promotional offers …

articles.title: Love blossoms: S.H.E's Selina Jen confirms she is dating 6 years after divorce - AsiaOne
